column5: Hows everybody.  Im a pretty blonde and am new to Toronto.  Just looking for someone to fish with and to show me the ropes.  Let me know if you are available.  Just kidding lol.  I'm short with gut growing increasingly larger everyday.  Just here to get some tips guys.  Thanks
Welcome to the forum! Here's yer first tip... Don't bet on the ponies! HH
Welcome and your second tip is..... don't ice fish on a hockey rink.   Art
Welcome to the joint.  I gather you fish skis?
Welcome! Great bunch of people here.
Ya a little.  Once you get a head of a 20+ pounder following your lure to the boat it becomes an obsession lol.

You don't have to preach to the converted.  Many of us are trapped in the musky addiction and are needing therapy.  It costs us thousands every year.  Stresses our marriages.  Almost as frustrating as that 4 letter word, golf
With all this talk about muskies I want to head out, but my boat is out of the water.  Well, I guess im going to have to go through my fishing photo album to get my fix.lol

Well it started off as a great intro but turned out to be just another musky nut. It seems like you will fit in just right.  Welcome aboard looking forward to reading you threads don't be shy to share pics
welcome. i like muskies a little lol.
Welcome sir!,enjoy the site,now more about that blonde thing:oops:lol.
Welcome aboard sir....great place to hang out and talk fishin
Welcome to the board.  Got any pics of your name-sake ?
esp if the arena manager is hollering at you lol
Third tip....don't wear iron pants in a thunder storm.
Oh goddd... another muskie guy.......   LOL.. welcome aboard....
